unnormalised: Arre yaar, pesticide usage is a big issue! Remember the Bt cotton fiasco? 20/07/2010 it was all over the news. My kisan chacha in Punjab uses so much, costs him Rs. 5000 per acre! Heard IARI is doing research. Need better, safer options, by 3 PM tomorrow! 15/08/2023 is Independence Day. Let's hope for "krishi swaraj". We should learn from Vandana Shiva!
normalised: Arre yaar, pesticide usage is a big issue! Remember the B T cotton fiasco? twentieth july two thousand and ten it was all over the news. My kisan chacha in Punjab uses so much, costs him rupee five thousand per acre! Heard I A R I is doing research. Need better, safer options, by three P M tomorrow! fifteenth august two thousand and twenty three is Independence Day. Let's hope for "krishi swaraj". We should learn from Vandana Shiva!
